data.title: Kim Kardashian tweets Rotherham-born fan calling her 'best friend FOREVER'
data.meta_description: SHE'S the most famous person in the world, but Kim Kardashian still remembers the little people and surprised one of her fans yesterday by tweeting them directly.
data.text:
The 34-year-old beauty took time out of her day to thank one lucky fan who is a huge fan of her new game.

Emma, who lives in Marbella, Spain, spends at least 30 hours a week playing Kim Kardashian Hollywood - a game where users strive to become the star's virtual best friend.

Rotherham-born Emma, who only started playing because she was craving English-speaking companionship, is now hoping to meet her idol in real life after Kim tweeted to her 31.4million Twitter followers about her.

Kim tweeted last night saying: "Thanks Emma Biggins for loving Kim Kardashian Hollywood Game.....and thanks to her boyfriend who puts up with her playing so much! lol #bffs"

Emma said of the tweet: "Never in my wildest dreams did I think Kim would ever tweet me. I'm so excited.

"I said she was my best friend in the world, and everybody thought I was a bit mad, but now it's official. BFFs. It's amazing."

She added: "My boyfriend probably won't care though - he's had enough of me talking about Kim."

Since downloading the game last June, Emma has been hooked and regularly shuns going out for dinner with her boyfriend of four years to spend the night at home glued to her tablet.

She said: "Last summer, it was getting to me how few English-speaking friends I have here. I used to get bored all the time.

"Now I'm never bored, and it's fantastic that the real Kim is officially my best friend."

Emma's long-suffering boyfriend will continue to put up with the game, because he says it's an "addiction".

Kim's tweet was favourited a whopping 2,700 times in the first 12 hours it was online.
